indices.Name: age
indices.Description: Index for age (number of years since installation) into a parameter shaping curve; default elements 1–200.

indices.Name: all_r
indices.Description: All internal and external regions.

indices.Name: bd
indices.Description: Index of bound type; subset of lim, having the internally fixed elements ‘LO’, ‘UP’, ‘FX’.

indices.Name: c
indices.Description: User defined list of all commodities in all regions; subset of cg.

indices.Name: cg
indices.Description: User defined list of all commodities and commodity groups in all regions; each commodity itself is considered a commodity group; initial elements are the members of com_type.

indices.Name: com_type
indices.Description: Indicator of commodity type; initialized to the predefined types DEM, NRG, MAT, ENV, FIN (see Table 1).

indices.Name: costagg
indices.Description: Indicator of cost aggregation type; initialized to list of predefined types (see Table 1).

indices.Name: cur
indices.Description: User defined list of currency units.

indices.Name: datayear
indices.Description: Years for which model input data are specified.

indices.Name: dem_sect
indices.Description: Indicator of demand sector; initialized to list of predefined sectors (see Table 1).

indices.Name: env_type
indices.Description: Indicator of environmental commodity type; initialized to list of predefined elements (see Table 1).

indices.Name: ie
indices.Description: Export/import exchange indicator; internally fixed = 'EXP' for exports and 'IMP' for imports.

indices.Name: io
indices.Description: Input/Output indicator for defining whether a commodity flow enters or leaves a process; internally fixed = 'IN' for enters and 'OUT' for leaves.

indices.Name: j
indices.Description: Indicator for elastic demand steps and sequence number of the shape/multi curves; default elements 1–999.

indices.Name: kp
indices.Description: Index for “kink” points in ETL formulation; currently limited to 1-6 {can be extended in <case>.run file by including SET KP / 1*n /; for n-kink points.

indices.Name: lim
indices.Description: Index of limit types; internally fixed = 'LO', 'UP', 'FX' and 'N'.

indices.Name: nrg_type
indices.Description: Indicator of energy commodity type; initialized to predefined types (see Table 1).

indices.Name: p
indices.Description: User defined list of all processes in all regions.

indices.Name: pastyear
indices.Description: Years for which past investments are specified; pastyears should usually be before the beginning of the first period but past investments may also be specified on later years.

indices.Name: prc_grp
indices.Description: List of process groups; internally established in MAPLIST.DEF (see Table 1).

indices.Name: r
indices.Description: Explicit regions within the area of study. Subset of all_r.

indices.Name: s
indices.Description: Timeslice divisions of a year, at any of the tslvl levels.

indices.Name: side
indices.Description: Side indicator for defining coefficients in user constraints; internally fixed = 'LHS', 'RHS'.

indices.Name: t
indices.Description: Representative years for the model periods.

indices.Name: teg
indices.Description: Technologies modelled with endogenous technology learning. Subset of p.

indices.Name: tslvl
indices.Description: Timeslice level indicator; internally fixed = 'ANNUAL', 'SEASON', 'WEEKLY', 'DAYNITE'.

indices.Name: u
indices.Description: List of all units; maintained in the file UNITS.DEF.

indices.Name: uc_grptype
indices.Description: Fixed internal list of the key types of variables (see Table 1).

indices.Name: uc_n
indices.Description: User specified unique indicator for a user constraint.

indices.Name: uc_name
indices.Description: Fixed list of indicators associated with various attributes that can be referenced in user constraints to be applied when deriving a coefficient (see Table 1).

indices.Name: unit
indices.Description: List of capacity blocks that can be added in lumpy investment option; default elements 0–100; the element '0' describes the case when no capacity is added.

indices.Name: units_act
indices.Description: List of activity units; maintained in the file UNITS.DEF.

indices.Name: units_cap
indices.Description: List of capacity units; maintained in the file UNITS.DEF.

indices.Name: units_com
indices.Description: List of commodity units; maintained in the file UNITS.DEF.

indices.Name: v
indices.Description: Union of the set pastyear and t corresponding to all modelling periods.

indices.Name: ww
indices.Description: States of the world that can be used; default elements 1–64; under user control by the dollar control parameter $SET MAXSOW <n> in the <case>.RUN file

indices.Name: year
indices.Description: Years that can be used in the model; default range 1850-2200; under user control by the dollar control parameters $SET BOTIME <y> and $SET EOTIME <y> in the <case>.RUN file.
